description: This is the main entry point for a Flutter-based Music Player application. It initializes app-wide providers, manages navigation, and sets up the main UI components including a bottom navigation bar and a mini player widget.

classes.name: MusicPlayerApp
classes.description: Root widget of the music player app, responsible for overall state management, navigation, and app initialization.

classes.name: _MusicPlayerAppState
classes.description: State class managing the internal state of MusicPlayerApp, including initialization, current view index, and UI updates.

classes.name: _BottomNavBar
classes.description: Stateless widget providing the bottom navigation bar with three tabs: Home, Search, Library.

methods.name: main
methods.description: Application entry point. Runs the music player app.

methods.name: _bootstrap
methods.description: Initializes asynchronous resources, specifically SharedPreferences, and updates the app state upon completion.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Builds the main UI of the app, displaying either a loading indicator or the main scaffold with navigation and mini player.

methods.name: _buildBody
methods.description: Returns the current screen widget based on the selected bottom navigation index.

methods.name: createState
methods.description: Creates the mutable state for the MusicPlayerApp widget.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Builds the UI for the respective widget, either the main app scaffold or the bottom navigation bar.
